main event: Two unidentified disc-shaped objects were sighted in the sky over Wichita Falls, Texas.
interesting points: The objects were described as having a dull metallic color., The sighting occurred on 5-6-52 at 2300 GMT., Reports indicate that the objects moved straight and at erratic levels., The sighting was recorded by a civilian police officer who noted the objects' rapid movement., The sighting lasted for approximately 20 seconds.
